title: Sport Life
additional-notes: A note in the 1976 January-June CCE Periodicals volume says to 'consult copyright office' for full issue renewal information.  The first cataloged issue renewal, mentioned in the July-December 1977 CCE Periodicals volume, is for the September 1948 issue, and was filed in 1976.
This periodical appears to have begun a new series (starting again from volume 1, number 1) in 1954.
